subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: For nearly an hour the cars and drivers sat parked on the starting grid. The rain got weaker, but the sky became darker as evening approached, and 52 minutes later, officials announced that the race would not restart.
snippet: For nearly an hour the cars and drivers sat parked on the starting grid. The rain got weaker, but the sky became darker as evening approached, and 52 minutes later, officials announced that the race would not restart.
